title: Ping randomly shoots up to 500 from consistently 30-40 leading to "attempting to reconnect"
body:
Hi, this is another "attempting to reconnect thread". My ping is around 30-40, download speed is 1.95, and upload speed is 0.25 if that helps. Throughout most of the game it runs perfectly fine with 30-40 ping, and then BAM, a 500 ping spike that makes "attempting to reconnect" pop up, forcing me to leave the game. 

I've tried to reconnect after that multiple times, and each time I am not able to get on. I've had the same issue with starcraft lotv, but not with hearthstone or tf2. I am on wifi and I am not able to use an Ethernet cable so that isn't a solution. I've had this problem for about 6 months now, and I am really hoping someone could help me, thanks!

replies.body: Sounds like packet losshow far are you from the router also do as targon said and follow those instructions... diagnosing a computer issue is oftem trial and error as many things can cause the same symtoms
